_comment: JSON Configuration file for the s1pacRelay application

Mapping._data_expiration_seconds_comment: Number of seconds after which data is erased MultIndex only, mainly for testing

Filters._filter_comment: list of protocols to capture. Leave empty for all packets

Transmission._protocol_comment: transport protocol used to communicate with aircraft. Options are udp or sctp.

Mode._test_comment: Set to true for test/debug mode, set to false for production mode
